text: Hey Shamash, this is within the new drag and drop email editor, right? At the moment that's required but it's something that we plan on making optional/customisable later this year.

Gotcha, thanks! Yeah it's a necessary evil for the moment. All the base modules come baked in with 30px of padding all around them to make things breath a little, and this pushes through to custom modules too but we realise that not all custom modules were designed in the same way the base modules are so we definitely plan on opening this up to make it totally flexible for developers :+1:
Got it, thanks. Yes, that would be very helpful :slightly_smiling_face: Looking forward to that
